Class RWLockProtected<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gmail.woodyc40.commons.concurrent.protect.RWLockProtected<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProtectedField<T>

    @ThreadSafe
class RWLockProtected<T>
extends Object
implements ProtectedField<T>
    Implementation of ProtectedField using ReentrantReadWriteLock

      • access

        public void access(ParameterizedRunnable runnable)
        Description copied from interface: ProtectedField
        Performs a safe action on the field

        This is not truly thread safe unless the code in the ParamaterizedRunnable is thread safe as well.

        Specified by:
        access in interface ProtectedField<T>
        Parameters:
        runnable - return null at the end, the parameter is the injected value of the field
